bwwExcerpt: When I panned Mamma Mia!, I lost a few friends. Maybe they'll come back when I say that I found On Your Feet!, the story of the Cuban-American pop star Gloria Estefan and her husband, Emilio Estefan, to be irresistible. With the recent closing of the Abba-fest, Broadway has needed a high-octane evening to send audiences shuffling happily into the street - with the tunes pounding away in their heads the next day.
